Mucho Thanks. Do you or does anyone have the 2nd Edition and the all important Companion CD? These development kits come with a DVD and companion CD, the DVD only contains Visual Studio which you can get anywhere, but you can\'t do the course properly without the companion CD which has exercises, examples, mock tests and other stuff.
